responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "C75F2AB7410D412E5699EDBB8FD6B5BE", "I have heard of a scroll written by a former squire of one of the knights. It is just a rumor, but he was said to have recorded the event in an old Aelan dialect. They say he was known as Dondreth Do\'Kun, the Slumber Warrior. Alas, that is all I know and I know most, but should you find the scroll, I can translate it.")
name: MADD_0007_BOB_Historian_Phase03_22
